sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Container, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; function Basket() { const [Basket, setBasket] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { fetch("/catalog") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setBasket(data)); }, []); return ( {Basket.map((el) => (

Корзина

{el.name}

{el.price} РУБ.
  • Итого:
    21 498 руб.
  • Налог 5%:
    1074 руб.
    • ))}     ); } export default Basket;
